Reviews.Content: hotels dated electrical panel fuses exposed door tired furniture tv flat screen oh free wireless didnt top faced directly busy building site noisy sunday

Reviews.Title: “Nice Little Hotel”

Reviews.Content: bad stay clean staff ok didnt inter action speak english breakfast fine typical continental range fresh coffee dinner hotel chose set 4 course menu €30 value money food bed comfortable mattress hard free wifi coverage intermittent stay

Reviews.Title: “Hotel is just OK”
Reviews.Author: GeorgiP
Reviews.Content: weve stayed hotel wife 3 nights hotel ok 5 minutes walking metro eur station near station awful flea market annoying hotel building probably 1520 furniture looks ok allowed checkin 930 happy clean 22 lcd tv bathroom clean probably free wifi connection breakfast average italy espresso included staff helpful especially night bartender
